mapper.select:
select
from t_settle_accounts a where (house_owner = #{houseOwner} or lessee = #{houseOwner}) and address = #{address} and deleted = 0

select
from t_settle_accounts a where (house_owner = #{houseOwner} or lessee = #{houseOwner}) and address = #{address} and deleted = 0 and id <> #{id}

mapper.select: select COUNT(1) from t_settle_accounts where house_owner = #{houseOwner , jdbcType=VARCHAR} and deleted = 0

sql.if: and (house_owner like concat('%',#{houseOwner} ,'%') or lessee like concat('%',#{houseOwner} ,'%'))

mapper.select:
select
from t_settle_accounts a left join t_protocol_other b on a.id = b.accounts_id where deleted = 0
order by a.create_date asc limit ${firstResult}, ${maxResults}
order by area_id, a.create_date asc
select count(1) from t_settle_accounts a left join t_protocol_other b on a.id = b.accounts_id where deleted = 0
mapper.update: update t_settle_accounts set signing_date = #{signingDate} , modified_date = #{modifiedDate}, modified_user_id = #{modifiedUserId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select compensate_type , count(1) as id from t_settle_accounts where deleted = 0
group by compensate_type

select b.project_code as projectCode,b.name, sum(case signing_status when 0 then 1 else 0 end) as noSigned, sum(case signing_status when 1 then 1 else 0 end) as completer, sum(case signing_status when 2 then 1 else 0 end) as audit from t_settle_accounts a inner join t_area b on a.area_id = b.id where a.deleted = 0 group by project_code,b.name

select b.project_code as projectCode,b.name, sum(ifnull(value_compensate,0))/10000 as valueCompensate, sum(ifnull(no_register_legal,0))/10000 as noRegisterLegal, sum(ifnull(history_legacy, 0))/10000 as historyLegacy, sum(ifnull(decoration_compensate,0))/10000 as decorationCompensate, sum(ifnull(move_house_fee,0))/10000 as moveHouseFee,
sum(ifnull(interim_fee,0))/10000 as interimFee, sum(ifnull(move_water_meter_fee,0))/10000 as moveWaterMeterFee, sum(ifnull(move_ammeter_fee,0))/10000 as moveAmmeterFee, sum(ifnull(move_air_conditioning_fee,0))/10000 as moveAirConditioningFee, sum(ifnull(hot_water_compensate,0))/10000 as hotWaterCompensate, sum(ifnull(gas_fee,0))/10000 as gasFee, sum(ifnull(structure_compensate,0))/10000 as structureCompensate, sum(ifnull(suspend_business_fee,0))/10000 as suspendBusinessFee, sum(ifnull(structure_balcony,0))/10000 as structureBalcony,
sum(ifnull(structure_build,0))/10000 as structureBuild, sum(ifnull(structure_dark,0))/10000 as structureDark, sum(ifnull(structure_mezzanine,0))/10000 as structureMezzanine, sum(ifnull(structure_roof,0))/10000 as structureRoof, sum(ifnull(affiliated_other,0))/10000 as affiliatedOther, sum(ifnull(change_compensate,0))/10000 as changeCompensate,
sum(ifnull(rmb_compensate,0))/10000 as rmbCompensate, sum(ifnull(small_area_reward,0))/10000 as smallAreaReward, sum(ifnull(life_compensate,0))/10000 as lifeCompensate, sum(ifnull(move_reward,0))/10000 as moveReward, sum(ifnull(guarantee,0))/10000 as guarantee, sum(ifnull(building_area_fee,0))/10000 as buildingAreaFee, sum(ifnull(other_rmb,0))/10000 as otherRmb
from t_settle_accounts a inner join t_area b on a.area_id = b.id where a.deleted = 0 group by b.project_code, b.name
